Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: Edad>=18

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: Sexo= 'F' OR Sexo= 'M'

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRANSACTION TRASA
BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
UPDATE DBO.Empleado SET IdTipoIdentificacion=@IdTipoIdentificacion, IdEmpresa=@IdEmpresa, Identificacion=@Identificacion, NombreEmpleado=@NombreEmpleado, Edad=@Edad, Sexo=@Sexo, Estado=@Estado, TieneVehiculo=@TieneVehiculo, Vehiculos=@Vehiculos
WHERE IdEmpleado=@IdEmpleado
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRANSACTION TRASA
BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
DELETE FROM DBO.Empleado WHERE IdEmpleado=@IdEmpleado
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRANSACTION TRASA
BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
INSERT INTO dbo.Empleado ( IdTipoIdentificacion , IdEmpresa , Identificacion , NombreEmpleado , Edad , Sexo , Estado , TieneVehiculo , Vehiculos ) VALUES ( @IdTipoIdentificacion , @IdEmpresa , @Identificacion , @NombreEmpleado , @Edad , @Sexo , @Estado , @TieneVehiculo , @Vehiculos )
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT E.IdEmpleado , E.Identificacion , E.NombreEmpleado , E.Edad , E.Sexo , E.Estado , E.TieneVehiculo , E.Vehiculos , TI.IdTipoIdentificacion , TI.Descripcion , EM.IdEmpresa , EM.NombreEmpresa
FROM dbo.Empleado E LEFT JOIN dbo.TipoIdentificacion TI ON E.IdTipoIdentificacion = TI.IdTipoIdentificacion LEFT JOIN dbo.Empresa EM ON E.IdEmpresa = EM.IdEmpresa WHERE (@IdEmpleado IS NULL OR IdEmpleado=@IdEmpleado)
END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON

BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
UPDATE DBO.Empresa SET NombreEmpresa=@NombreEmpresa, Estado=@Estado
WHERE IdEmpresa=@IdEmpresa
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY

ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON --Modificacion BEGIN TRANSACTION TRANSA
BEGIN TRY
INSERT INTO dbo.Empresa ( NombreEmpresa , Estado
) VALUES ( @NombreEmpresa , @Estado )
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRANSA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' As MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRANSA
END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT IdEmpresa , NombreEmpresa
FROM dbo.Empresa WHERE Estado=1 order by NombreEmpresa
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[EmpresaLista]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT IdEmpresa , NombreEmpresa , Estado
FROM dbo.Empresa WHERE (@IdEmpresa IS NULL OR IdEmpresa=@IdEmpresa)
END

BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON

BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
INSERT INTO dbo.TipoIdentificacion ( Descripcion , Estado ) VALUES ( @Descripcion , @Estado )
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:

SELECT IdTipoIdentificacion , Descripcion , Estado
FROM dbo.TipoIdentificacion WHERE (@IdTipoIdentificacion IS NULL OR IdTipoIdentificacion=@IdTipoIdentificacion)
END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRANSACTION TRASA
BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
DECLARE @vcontrasena varbinary(100)=CAST(HASHBYTES('SHA1',@Contrasena) as varbinary(100))
update Usuario SET
Nombre=@Nombre, Contrasena=@vcontrasena WHERE IdUsuario=@IdUsuario
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRANSACTION TRASA
BEGIN TRY -- AQUI VA EL CODIGO
DECLARE @vcontrasena varbinary(100)=CAST(HASHBYTES('SHA1',@Contrasena) as varbinary(100))
INSERT INTO Usuario ( Usuario, Nombre, Contrasena, Estado ) VALUES( @Usuario, @Nombre, @vcontrasena, 1 )
COMMIT TRANSACTION TRASA
SELECT 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS CodeError , ERROR_MESSAGE() AS MsgError
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION TRASA END CATCH
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @vcontrasena varbinary(100)= CAST(HASHBYTES('SHA1',@Contrasena) as varbinary(100))
DECLARE @User INT=NULL, @Estado BIT=NULL, @UsuarioNoExiste VARCHAR(150)=NULL
SELECT @UsuarioNoExiste=Usuario FROM Usuario WHERE Usuario=@Usuario
SELECT @User=IdUsuario, @Estado=Estado FROM Usuario WHERE Usuario=@Usuario AND Contrasena=@vcontrasena
IF @User IS NOT NULL AND @Estado =1 BEGIN
SELECT IdUsuario, Nombre, 0 AS CodeError, '' AS MsgError FROM Usuario WHERE Usuario=@Usuario AND Contrasena=@vcontrasena
END
IF @User IS NOT NULL AND @Estado=0 BEGIN
SELECT -2 AS CodeError, 'El Usuario no se encuentra activo!' AS MsgError
END
IF @User IS NULL AND @UsuarioNoExiste IS NOT NULL BEGIN
SELECT -3 AS CodeError, 'Contrasea incorrecta!' AS MsgError
END
IF @UsuarioNoExiste IS NULL BEGIN SELECT -4 AS CodeError, 'Usuario no existe!' AS MsgError
END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
